Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm

Class JavaVirtualMachine

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm.JavaVirtualMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, MessageTransceiver, Repeater, Transceiver, Receiver, Transmitter, Nameable, NamedObject
public class JavaVirtualMachine extends BaseRepeater
An object for working with the Java virtual machine.

Access

An instance of the local Java virtual machine can be retrieved with javaVirtualMachine()

Resource Availability

  • freeMemory()
  • maximumMemory()
  • processors()
  • totalMemory()
  • usedMemory()

  • invalidateProperties()
  • systemProperties()
  • systemPropertiesAndEnvironmentVariables()

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
